ingredients: 1 cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk,   +   1/2 cup rolled oats,   +   1/2 medium banana, mashed, 1 tablespoon chia seeds
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Sodium 155mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 60g 22%, Dietary Fiber 10g 34%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 7mg 34%, Calcium 90mg 7%, Iron 3mg 16%, Potassium 375mg 8%
